title:
Convergence of Sinkhorn's Algorithm for Entropic Martingale Optimal
  Transport Problem
authors: Fan Chen, Giovanni Conforti, Zhenjie Ren, Xiaozhen Wang
abstract:
In this paper, we study the Entropic Martingale Optimal Transport (EMOT)
problem on R. We begin by introducing the dual formulation and prove the
exponential convergence of Sinkhorn's algorithm on the dual potential
coefficients. Our analysis does not require prior knowledge of the optimal
potential and confirms that there is no primal-dual gap. Our findings provide a
theoretical guarantee for solving the EMOT problem using Sinkhorn's algorithm.
In applications, our result provides insight into the calibration of stochastic
volatility models, as proposed by Henry-Labordere.
